En Fit & Healthy hemos implementado medi: At Fit & Healthy we have implemented safety measures developed by scientists from the Fit & Health LAB and supervised and validated by our experts in Virology, Epidemiology and Public Health from Sheffield Hallam University and Rey Juan Carlos I. All of them ensuring a safety index of 7.4 out of 8 against COVID-19. So we guarantee that you will not be
Fit & Healthy nace de la mano de inverso: Fit & Healthy was born from the hand of experienced investors in the health and sports sector, who have more than 40 years of experience and success in other European countries, where they have already become a reference within this sector. This has led us to enter Spain with an innovative and proven model, which is having a lot of acceptance and success among our clients.
Programas para aquellas personas que acu: Programs for those who come to Fit & Healthy with fun as one of their main objectives.
Disfruta de la práctica deportiva, mient: Enjoy sports, while your children enjoy games and activities adapted for them.
Dedica a tu felicidad 150 minutos de eje: Dedicate 150 minutes of exercise a week to your happiness and you will live longer and better, it is proven.
Desarrollado por Carlos Arenas Carretero: Developed by Carlos Arenas Carretero. IES Trassierra student.
En Fit & Healthy contamos con gran canti: At Fit & Healthy we have a large number of directed activities, to adapt to the needs of our partners. Depending on your chosen rate, you can choose the directed activities that most suit you agree with those who, in addition to practicing sports and getting your goals, you will have fun!
